title: Fix for VaultIndexProcessor Navigation Logic
details:
Successfully fixed navigation issues in VaultIndexProcessor.cs. The problems resolved:

1. **Main Index Navigation**: Fixed detection logic to use frontmatter["index-type"] == "main" instead of hierarchyLevel == 0, ensuring MBA.md shows only Dashboard and Classes Assignments links (no "Back" or parent links).

2. **Back Navigation Text**: Fixed hardcoded generic text like "Back to Program Index" to use actual parent folder names. Now shows meaningful text like "MBA", "Program", "Finance" etc.

3. **Vault Root Index Prevention**: No index file is created at vault root (temp-test-vault.md).

4. **Hierarchy Metadata**: Fixed MetadataHierarchyDetector mapping to ensure correct hierarchy metadata at all levels.

**Navigation Examples After Fix:**
- Program.md: "ðŸ”™ [[MBA|MBA]]" (was "Back to Program Index")
- Finance.md: "ðŸ”™ [[Program|Program]]" (was "Back to Course Index")
- Corporate-Finance.md: "ðŸ”™ [[Finance|Finance]]" (was "Back to Class Index")

**Technical Changes:**
- Removed hardcoded backLinkText assignments
- Used FriendlyTitleHelper.GetFriendlyTitleFromFileName() on backLinkTarget
- Maintained correct URL targets while fixing display text

The navigation is now intuitive and shows actual parent folder names instead of generic text.
